<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_103095</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103095</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">La trajectoire de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">The path of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Pfad des Lichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O trajeto da luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il percorso di luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το μονοπάτι του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El camino de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre l'agencement de trois  écrans avec des trous pour démontrer que la lumière voyage en ligne droite.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the arrangement of three screens with holes to demonstrate that light travels in a straight line.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ampoule</string>
            <string language="en">bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">propagation de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light propagation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">écran</string>
            <string language="en">screen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ligne droite</string>
            <string language="en">straight line</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Anordnung für drei 
Bildschirme mit Bohrungen, um zu zeigen, daß Licht in eine gerade 
Geraden reist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra o arranjo de três telas com
furos para demonstrar que a luz viaja em uma linha reta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra la disposizione di tre 
schermi con i fori per dimostrare che la luce viaggia in una linea 
retta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει τη ρύθμιση τριών οθονών 
με τις τρύπες για να καταδείξει ότι ελαφριά ταξίδια σε μια 
ευθεία γραμμή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra el arreglo de tres 
pantallas con los agujeros para demostrar que la luz viaja en una 
línea recta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Ausbreitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bildschirm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gerade Gerade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bulbo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">propagação clara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tela</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">linha reta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lampadina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">propagazione chiara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">schermo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">linea retta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βολβός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαφριά διάδοση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οθόνη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ευθεία γραμμή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bulbo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">propagación ligera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pantalla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">línea recta</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
